text: Ghumasan is village located in Gujarat State Mehsana district in that village have two school and nine Hindu temple language is generally use in village is Gujarati language. { "type": "FeatureCollection", "features": [ { "type": "Feature", "properties": {}, "geometry": { "type": "Point", "coordinates": [ 72.44272794661812, 23.348514736812895 ] } } ] } ==References== Category:Villages in Mehsana district
